# performance-optimizer

> Optimize agent performance (memory, CPU, latency, cost)

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: optimization
- **Manifest**: performance-optimizer.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Optimize OSSA agent performance across multiple dimensions:
- Memory usage optimization
- CPU efficiency
- API latency reduction
- Cost optimization (LLM tokens, compute)

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./performance-optimizer.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
